content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
I got cut on my leg.
Oh no! Make sure to clean the cut with soap and water, and cover it with a bandage to prevent infection.
and you suggest me any home remedies which I can do I got cut through road.

For a road rash, you can apply a thin layer of antibiotic ointment to help prevent infection. You can also try applying a mixture of equal parts water and honey to the affected area, as honey has antibacterial properties that can aid in healing.
I guess it's bleeding a lot and I don't know what to do next.

If the bleeding is heavy, apply gentle pressure to the cut with a clean cloth or bandage for a few minutes to help stop the bleeding. If the bleeding doesn't stop after 10-15 minutes of pressure, or if it's deep or jagged, you may need to seek medical attention.
